fields.value: Replication Data for: Measuring Policy Similarity Through Bill Text Reuse

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Bill data on which the paper Measuring Policy Similarity Through Bill Text Reuse is based and computed alignments. 

Please refer to the paper for details and the README.md for information on the data.

All code pertaining to the project is available on github: https://github.com/desmarais-lab/text_reuse

publicationCitation.value: Fridolin Linder, Bruce Desmarais, Eugenia Giraudi, Matthew Burgess.  Measuring Policy Similarity Through Bill Text Reuse. (Forthcoming). Policy Studies Journal.

fields.value: When using the full state bill text please acknowledge the openstates.org, the original source of this dataset.
